title: Noncommunicable disease burden in Brazil and its states from 1990 to 2021, with projections for 2030
content:
Publication date: November 2024

Source: Public Health, Volume 236

Author(s): Deborah Carvalho Malta, Crizian Saar Gomes, Guilherme Augusto Veloso, Renato Azeredo Teixeira, Mariana Santos Felisbino Mendes, Luisa Campos Caldeira Brant, Elton Junio Sady Prates, Alanna Gomes Silva, Juliana Bottoni de Souza, Bruce Bartholow Duncan, Maria Inês Schmidt, Maria de Fátima Marinho de Souza, Ana Maria Nogales Vasconcelos, Célia Landmann Szwarcwald, Jorge Gustavo Velásquez Meléndez, Ísis Eloah Machado, Mohsen Naghavi, Antônio Luiz Pinho Ribeiro
